SELECT DISTINCT a.wine_origin_id, a.region_seo_name, a.region_name_eng, a.region_name_chs, a.region_name_cht, parent_origin_id, country_id FROM t_origin a INNER JOIN t_wine b ON a.wine_origin_id = b.wine_origin_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage c ON b.wine_id = c.wine_id INNER JOIN t_product d ON c.wine_id = d.wine_id AND c.vintage_tag = d.vintage_tag WHERE d.supplier_id = #{supplierId} order by mic_rank

SELECT DISTINCT a.wine_origin_id, a.region_seo_name, a.region_name_eng, a.region_name_chs, a.region_name_cht, a.parent_origin_id, a.country_id FROM t_origin a INNER JOIN t_wine b ON a.wine_origin_id = b.wine_origin_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage c ON b.wine_id = c.wine_id INNER JOIN t_product d ON c.wine_id = d.wine_id AND c.vintage_tag = d.vintage_tag WHERE d.supplier_id = #{supplierId} and a.country_id = #{countryId} order by mic_rank
